review: Still exploring the capabilities. I just got a Kindle as well and it seems like the sync between devices, apps and so on are vast and building fast. You do need to have time to explore...Great out of the gate...

review: it does everything it is supposed to do...i was concerned that the remote would have some difficulty since it connects behind the TV, but it works just fine..thank you amazon

review: We love our Fire TV Stick! There are many old shows that we have enjoyed watching for free on our device with our Prime account, and the device is a great addition to the smart TV we are using it with!
